chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: lb

Goal:
lb_succ ⟘ l ≂ l

Premises:
lb_succ = fix lb_succ (a : bool) (l : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => a :: nil | x :: l0 => let (r, z) := bin_add ⟘ a x in z :: lb_succ r l0 end : bool -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_succ _%bool_scope _%list_scope
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_succ_spec_0 : forall l : lb, ⟦ lb_succ ⟘ l ⟧ = ⟦ l ⟧
lb_succ_spec_1 : forall l : lb, ⟦ lb_succ ⟙ l ⟧ = S ⟦ l ⟧
lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_succ_spec : forall (a : bool) (l : lb), ⟦ lb_succ a l ⟧ = bool2nat a + ⟦ l ⟧
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
lb_complement : forall a b : lb, {c : lb | b ⟂ c /\ a ↑ b ≂ c ↑ b}
lb_nat_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) => (let H0 : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m -> ⟦ l ⟧ = ⟦ m ⟧ := fun l m : lb => match lb_mask_equiv_equal l m with | conj x0 _ => x0 end in H0) x y H : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> eq) lb_nat Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> ⟦ x ⟧ = ⟦ y ⟧ Arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper [x y]
lb_minus : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\ b ≂ a ↑ c}
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
nat_lb_1 = eq_ind_r (fun l : lb => l = ⟙ :: nil) (eq_ind_r (fun l : lb => ⟙ :: l = ⟙ :: nil) eq_refl nat_lb_fix_0) (nat_lb_fix_2 0) : ⟬ 1 ⟭ = ⟙ :: nil
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
lb_mask_inv_nil : forall l : lb, ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_nat_fix_1 : forall l : lb, ⟦ ⟘ :: l ⟧ = 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
bool_ring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr bool * Ring_polynom.PExpr bool)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr bool), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) eq (IDphi (R:=bool)) id_phi_N (pow_N ⟙ andb) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (IDphi (R:=bool)) id_phi_N (pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (IDphi (R:=bool)) id_phi_N (pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe2
lb_mask_equiv_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ≂ m -> m ≂ k -> l ≂ k
lb_mask_equiv_cons_Proper = fun (x y : bool) (H : x = y) => eq_ind_r (fun x0 : bool => Morphisms.respectful lb_mask_equiv lb_mask_equiv (cons x0) (cons y)) (fun (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun y1 : bool => if y1 as b return (forall x1 y2 : lb, x1 ≂ y2 -> b :: x1 ≂ b :: y2) then fun (x1 y2 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y2) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => conj (lb_mask_leb ⟙ ⟙ eq_refl H2) (lb_mask_leb ⟙ ⟙ eq_refl H3) end else fun (x1 y2 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y2) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => conj (lb_mask_leb ⟘ ⟘ I H2) (lb_mask_leb ⟘ ⟘ I H3) end) y x0 y0...
lb_join = lb_pointwise orb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_join (_ _)%list_scope
lb_meet = lb_pointwise andb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_meet (_ _)%list_scope
bool_ring_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr bool * Ring_polynom.PExpr bool)) (l : lb), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) eq (IDphi (R:=bool)) id_phi_N (pow_N ⟙ andb) l lH -> forall lmp : list (bool * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol bool), Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) bool_eq (triv_div ⟘ ⟙ bool_eq) lH = lmp ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (IDphi (R:=bool)) id_phi_N (pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) ⟘ ⟙ bool_eq (IDphi (R:=bool)) (get_sign_None (C:=bool)) l npe
lb_mask_inv_cons_cons : forall l m : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ ⟘ :: m -> False
lb_mask_equiv_sym : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m -> m ≂ l
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
lb_mask_inv_left : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), x :: l ⪯ nil -> x = ⟘ /\ l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_equiv_refl : forall l : lb, l ≂ l
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_mask_nat : forall l : lb, ⟬ ⟦ l ⟧ ⟭ ≂ l
nat_lb_nat : forall l : lb, ⟬ ⟦ l ⟧ ⟭ ≂ l
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
leb_strict = I : ⟘ ⪦ ⟙
lb_mask_equiv_equal : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m < -> ⟦ l ⟧ = ⟦ m ⟧
lb_nat = fix lb_nat (l : lb) : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => bool2nat x + 2 * lb_nat l0 end : lb -> nat Arguments lb_nat _%list_scope
lb_join_nil_eq : forall a b : lb, a ↑ b ≂ nil -> a ≂ nil /\ b ≂ nil
Ascii.N_of_digits = fix N_of_digits (l : lb) : BinNums.N := match l with | nil => BinNums.N0 | b :: l' => BinNat.N.add (if b then BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH else BinNums.N0) (BinNat.N.mul (BinNums.Npos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (N_of_digits l')) end : lb -> BinNums.N Arguments Ascii.N_of_digits _%list_scope
lb_meet_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ≂ y ↓ y0

``` 
intros l.
induction l using lb_ortho_ind.
- apply lb_mask_equiv_trans with (l ++ nil) l l.
  + rewrite lb_mask_equiv_refl, lb_mask_equiv_app, lb_meet_eq. 
    * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl.
    * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl.
    * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl.
  + apply lb_mask_equiv_refl.
- apply lb_ortho_cons_inv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2].
  apply in_lb_ortho_2 in H1.
  contradiction.
Qed.
```

original: intros l. induction l using lb_ortho_ind. - apply lb_mask_equiv_trans with (l ++ nil) l l. + rewrite lb_mask_equiv_refl, lb_mask_equiv_app, lb_meet_eq. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. + apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. - apply lb_ortho_cons_inv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply in_lb_ortho_2 in H1. contradiction.
